transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello, awaz aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Sir, awaz nahi aa rahi hai aapki.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji sir.
Executive: Ji, aapne IndiaMART customer care pe connect kiya, batayenge kya help kar sakta hu?
Customer: Hanji sir.
Customer: Pichle char din se mera IndiaMART nahi chal raha hai sir.
Executive: Char din se IndiaMART nahi chal raha hai?
Customer: Nahi chal raha hai sir, lead bhi nahi le pa raha hu mai, loading ho raha hai bas pages.
Executive: To kuch technical issue aa raha hai, lead ko consume nahi kar pa rahe, correct sir?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ha sir, aap IndiaMART application se dekhte hai, mobile app se ya phir laptop ke computer se?
Customer: Mobile se sir.
Executive: Okay, please sir apne mobile ko loudspeaker karke once open karenge?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Aapke paas Android phone hai, iPhone hai sir?
Customer: Android.
Executive: Okay, please loudspeaker karke ek baar IndiaMART application open kijiye.
Customer: Kiya sir maine open.
Executive: Okay, wait a second sir.
Executive: Aapne recently account ko login kiya hai, logout kiya aisa kuch hai kya?
Customer: Hanji sir, logout kiya tha pichli baar, sabne bola tha logout karo isko to phir chalega.
Executive: Phir bhi nahi chala?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Okay, so once aap back aa jaiye aur jo IndiaMART ka application hai na usko press karke rakhiye 3 seconds ke liye.
Customer: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Press karke rakhenge to info ka ek option dikhayega, info karke aayega application info, us pe click kariyega.
Customer: Ji sir, application info ka.
Customer: Hanji sir.
Executive: Us pe click karenge, storage and catch ka ek option dikhega aapko, setting khula aapka.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Storage pe click open karenge to waha pe storage clear storage ka ek option show kar raha hoga.
Customer: Clear data aur clear catch aa raha hai.
Executive: Ha, clear data pe click kar lijiye.
Customer: Clear kar diya maine.
Executive: Niche jo clear catch wo automatic delete ho gaya hoga.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Okay, wapas se IndiaMART application open kariye back jaake.
Executive: To aapko login karne ka bol raha hoga, to aapka jo 60 se number hai, aap login kijiye.
Customer: Kiya maine sir login.
Executive: To aapke last me jo digit hai 535 hai, us number se aapne login kiya hai na?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Aap ek baar jara check kariye sir.
Customer: Nahi chala hai sir.
Executive: Same issue aa raha hai, aap mujhe ek baar iska screenshot leke mere whatsapp pe karenge, mera whatsapp number aapko bata raha hu.
Customer: Whatsapp number kya hai sir?
Executive: 8949
Customer: Ek second sir.
Customer: 8949
Executive: 288
Customer: 288
Executive: 637
Customer: 637
Executive: Sunil Choudhary.
Executive: Correct sir, ek baar us pe aap wo photo daliye.

Ji sir.

Mobile se sir.

Okay, please sir apne mobile ko loudspeaker karke once open karenge?

Ji sir.

Android.

Okay, please loudspeaker karke ek baar IndiaMART application open kijiye.

Kiya sir maine open.

Okay, wait a second sir.

Aapne recently account ko login kiya hai, logout kiya aisa kuch hai kya?

Hanji sir, logout kiya tha pichli baar, sabne bola tha logout karo isko to phir chalega.

Phir bhi nahi chala?

Nahi.

Okay, so once aap back aa jaiye aur jo IndiaMART ka application hai na usko press karke rakhiye 3 seconds ke liye.

Ji ji sir.

Press karke rakhenge to info ka ek option dikhayega, info karke aayega application info, us pe click kariyega.

Ji sir, application info ka.

Hanji sir.

Us pe click karenge, storage and catch ka ek option dikhega aapko, setting khula aapka.

Ji sir.

Storage pe click open karenge to waha pe storage clear storage ka ek option show kar raha hoga.

Clear data aur clear catch aa raha hai.

Ha, clear data pe click kar lijiye.

Clear kar diya maine.

Niche jo clear catch wo automatic delete ho gaya hoga.

Ji sir.

Okay, wapas se IndiaMART application open kariye back jaake.

To aapko login karne ka bol raha hoga, to aapka jo 60 se number hai, aap login kijiye.

Kiya maine sir login.

Ji sir.

Aap ek baar jara check kariye sir.

Nahi chala hai sir.

Same issue aa raha hai, aap mujhe ek baar iska screenshot leke mere whatsapp pe karenge, mera whatsapp number aapko bata raha hu.

Whatsapp number kya hai sir?

8949

Ek second sir.

8949

288

288

637

Correct sir, ek baar us pe aap wo photo daliye.
summary:
Concerns:

- IndiaMART app not working for four days.

- Unable to take leads, pages are loading.



Resolution:

- Asked to clear data and cache.

- Asked to login again.

- Asked to share screenshot on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after receiving screenshot.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app issue, login, screenshot
